welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stone Ridge, where small town charm meets natural beauty! Explore our quaint streets, visit our charming shops and restaurants, and take in the breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains. We hope you enjoy your stay in our lovely city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves most domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and private experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, Southwest, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic flights for Frontier and Sun Country.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
